title: Michael Burry Warns of Cascading Effects From Bitcoin Plunge
description: Michael Burry, the money manager made famous in The Big Short, warned that Bitcoin’s plunge could deepen into a self-reinforcing “death spiral,” inflicting lasting damage on companies that have spent the past year stockpiling the token.
